description:
Amami Hibiki has been able see ghosts and spirits since she was a young child. 
Rather than fear the otherworldly spirits, the kind young lady quickly befriends them. 
After transferring to a new school her classmates quickly adjust to Amami’s tendency to 
talk to empty space and walk around invisible obstacles...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: わたし, 視[み]えるんです.
